title: U.S. Senators Demand Explanation for SEC's Fake Bitcoin ETF Approval Tweet
description: Senators JD Vance (R-OH) and Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) wrote to "express concern and request clarity" regarding the SEC's social media blunder.

title: Crypto whale makes $11 million bet on Ethereum, shifting from Bitcoin
